entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023
